name: Finish the Game (MentixHD)
description:
General Info
This is my submission to the Wowie-GameJam. 
This was my second Jam and the third Game that I finished with unity.
It's the first time I used the web export of unity, so I'm sorry for bugs regarding that.
 Also, there is a Windows version you can download and unpack, it runs more stable than the web version.
The Windows version has some bugs fixed and more levels than the web version because the build for the web version didn't finish in time.
There is only the windows version now because i uploaded the web version to late

The Game

In this game you play as a sort of side character while the "Player" is an AI (not really an AI but since it was the theme of the Jam I am going to refer to it as one).
You need to place objects in a way so the level becomes possible.
It's really important that you know that objects won't fall if you place them on an edge. It is said in the tutorial but I thought I write it here again.
I hope it is fun although I didn't have enough time to make more exciting levels.

Theme interpretation
The theme ("Collaborate with AI")  is interpreted as you helping the computer to finish the game so it can be played.

Images and music
All the artwork (excluding two characters my sister made and three icons I used), as well as the music, is made by me.

Please share your thoughts with me in the comments so I can improve my game-making skills.
Have fun playing it  :3
